an4.14:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva na nimittaggahi hoti nanubyanjanaggahi.
an4.14:1.6: Yatvadhikaranamenam cakkhundriyam asamvutam viharantam abhijjhadomanassa papaka akusala dhamma anvassaveyyum, tassa samvaraya patipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriyam, cakkhundriye samvaram apajjati.
an4.14:1.11: manasa dhammam vinnaya na nimittaggahi hoti nanubyanjanaggahi,
an4.14:1.12: yatvadhikaranamenam manindriyam asamvutam viharantam abhijjhadomanassa papaka akusala dhamma anvassaveyyum, tassa samvaraya patipajjati, rakkhati manindriyam, manindriye samvaram apajjati.
an4.14:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannam kamavitakkam nadhivaseti pajahati vinodeti byantikaroti anabhavam gameti;
an4.14:2.5: uppannuppanne papake akusale dhamme nadhivaseti pajahati vinodeti byantikaroti anabhavam gameti.
an4.14:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim,
an4.14:3.8: upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
an4.14:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannam bhaddakam samadhinimittam anurakkhati atthikasannam pulavakasannam vinilakasannam vicchiddakasannam uddhumatakasannam.
